Description: Bachelor of Science degree with a major in Physics. During my studies, I also learned programming languages like Python, C++, and MATLAB, which gave me programming skills. My education in physics has provided me with a strong foundation in scientific principles, and my programming skills enable me to apply this knowledge in practical ways. This combination allows me to approach complex problems with both a scientific and computational mindset, making me well-prepared for various professional roles that require analytical thinking and technical expertise.
Thesis: Web-Based Application to Classify Skin Cancer with Deep Learning
